verses.verse: Then the <S%H3605>whole<s%> <S%H5712>congregation<s%> of the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> <S%H6950>assembled<s%> themselves at <S%H7887>Shiloh,<s%> and <S%H7931>set<s%> up the <S%H168>tent<s%> of <S%H4150>meeting<s%> <S%H8033>there;<s%> and the <S%H776>land<s%> was <S%H3533>subdued<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> them.
And there <S%H3498>remained<s%> among the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> <S%H7651>seven<s%> <S%H7626>tribes<s%> <S%H834>who<s%> had not <S%H2505>divided<s%> their <S%H5159>inheritance.<s%>

So <S%H3091>Joshua<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> <S%H575>"How<s%> <S%H5704>long<s%> will you <S%H7503>put<s%> <S%H7503>off<s%> <S%H935>entering<s%> to <S%H3423>take<s%> <S%H3423>possession<s%> of the <S%H776>land<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> the <S%H3068>Lord,<s%> the <S%H430>God<s%> of your fathers, has <S%H1>given<s%> you?

<S%H3051>"Provide<s%> for yourselves <S%H7969>three<s%> <S%H376>men<s%> from each <S%H7626>tribe<s%> that I may <S%H7971>send<s%> them, and that they may <S%H6965>arise<s%> and <S%H1980>walk<s%> through the <S%H776>land<s%> and <S%H3789>write<s%> a description of it <S%H6310>according<s%> to their <S%H5159>inheritance;<s%> then they shall <S%H935>return<s%> to me.

"And they shall <S%H2505>divide<s%> it into <S%H7651>seven<s%> <S%H2506>portions;<s%> <S%H3063>Judah<s%> shall <S%H5975>stay<s%> in its <S%H1366>territory<s%> on the <S%H5045>south,<s%> and the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H3130>Joseph<s%> shall <S%H5975>stay<s%> in their <S%H1366>territory<s%> on the <S%H6828>north.<s%>

"And you shall <S%H3789>describe<s%> the <S%H776>land<s%> in <S%H7651>seven<s%> <S%H2506>divisions,<s%> and <S%H935>bring<s%> [the description] <S%H2008>here<s%> to me. And I will <S%H3384>cast<s%> <S%H1486>lots<s%> for you <S%H6311>here<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> our <S%H430>God.<s%>

"For the <S%H3881>Levites<s%> <S%H369>have<s%> <S%H369>no<s%> <S%H2506>portion<s%> <S%H7130>among<s%> you, <S%H3588>because<s%> the <S%H3550>priesthood<s%> of the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> is their <S%H5159>inheritance.<s%> <S%H1410>Gad<s%> and <S%H7205>Reuben<s%> and the half-tribe of <S%H4519>Manasseh<s%> also have <S%H3947>received<s%> their <S%H5159>inheritance<s%> <S%H4217>eastward<s%> <S%H4480>beyond<s%> <S%H5676><s%> the <S%H3383>Jordan,<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> <S%H4872>Moses<s%> the <S%H5650>servant<s%> of the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> <S%H5414>gave<s%> them."

Then the <S%H376>men<s%> <S%H6965>arose<s%> and <S%H1980>went,<s%> and <S%H3091>Joshua<s%> <S%H6680>commanded<s%> those who <S%H1980>went<s%> to <S%H3789>describe<s%> the <S%H776>land,<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%> <S%H1980>"Go<s%> and <S%H1980>walk<s%> through the <S%H776>land<s%> and <S%H3789>describe<s%> it, and <S%H7725>return<s%> to me; then I will <S%H7993>cast<s%> <S%H1486>lots<s%> for you <S%H6311>here<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> in <S%H7887>Shiloh.<s%>"

So the <S%H376>men<s%> <S%H1980>went<s%> and <S%H5674>passed<s%> through the <S%H776>land,<s%> and <S%H3789>described<s%> it by <S%H5892>cities<s%> in <S%H7651>seven<s%> <S%H2506>divisions<s%> in a <S%H5612>book;<s%> and they <S%H935>came<s%> to <S%H3091>Joshua<s%> to the <S%H4264>camp<s%> at <S%H7887>Shiloh.<s%>

And <S%H3091>Joshua<s%> <S%H7993>cast<s%> <S%H1486>lots<s%> for them in <S%H7887>Shiloh<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> the <S%H3068>Lord,<s%> and <S%H8033>there<s%> <S%H3091>Joshua<s%> <S%H2505>divided<s%> the <S%H776>land<s%> to the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> according to their <S%H4256>divisions.<s%>

Now the <S%H1486>lot<s%> of the <S%H4294>tribe<s%> of the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H1144>Benjamin<s%> <S%H5927>came<s%> up according to their <S%H4940>families,<s%> and the <S%H1366>territory<s%> of their <S%H1486>lot<s%> <S%H3318>lay<s%> <S%H996>between<s%> the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H3063>Judah<s%> and the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H3130>Joseph.<s%>

And their <S%H1366>border<s%> on the <S%H6828>north<s%> <S%H6285>side<s%> was from the <S%H3383>Jordan,<s%> then the <S%H1366>border<s%> <S%H5927>went<s%> up to the <S%H3802>side<s%> of <S%H3405>Jericho<s%> on the <S%H6828>north,<s%> and <S%H5927>went<s%> up through the <S%H2022>hill<s%> <S%H2022>country<s%> <S%H3220>westward;<s%> and it <S%H1961>ended<s%> <S%H8444><s%> at the <S%H4057>wilderness<s%> of Beth-aven.

And from <S%H8033>there<s%> the <S%H1366>border<s%> <S%H5674>continued<s%> to <S%H3870>Luz,<s%> to the <S%H3802>side<s%> of <S%H3870>Luz<s%> (that is, <S%H1008>Bethel<s%>) <S%H5045>southward;<s%> and the <S%H1366>border<s%> <S%H3381>went<s%> <S%H3381>down<s%> to Ataroth-addar, <S%H5921>near<s%> the <S%H2022>hill<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> [lies] on the <S%H5045>south<s%> of <S%H8481>lower<s%> Beth-horon.

And the <S%H1366>border<s%> <S%H9638>extended<s%> [from there,] and <S%H5437>turned<s%> <S%H5437>round<s%> on the <S%H3220>west<s%> <S%H6285>side<s%> <S%H5045>southward,<s%> from the <S%H2022>hill<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> [lies] <S%H5921>before<s%> <S%H6440><s%> Beth-horon <S%H5045>southward;<s%> and it <S%H1961>ended<s%> <S%H8444><s%> at Kiriath-baal (that is, Kiriath-jearim), a <S%H5892>city<s%> of the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H3063>Judah.<s%> <S%H2088>This<s%> [was] the <S%H3220>west<s%> <S%H6285>side.<s%>

Then the <S%H5045>south<s%> <S%H6285>side<s%> [was] from the <S%H7097>edge<s%> of Kiriath-jearim, and the <S%H1366>border<s%> <S%H3318>went<s%> <S%H3220>westward<s%> and <S%H3318>went<s%> to the <S%H4599>fountain<s%> of the <S%H4325>waters<s%> of <S%H5318>Nephtoah.<s%>

And the <S%H1366>border<s%> <S%H3381>went<s%> <S%H3381>down<s%> to the <S%H7097>edge<s%> of the <S%H2022>hill<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> is in the <S%H1516>valley<s%> of <S%H2011>Ben-hinnom,<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> is in the <S%H6010>valley<s%> of <S%H7497>Rephaim<s%> <S%H6828>northward;<s%> and it <S%H3381>went<s%> <S%H3381>down<s%> to the <S%H1516>valley<s%> of Hinnom, to the <S%H3802>slope<s%> of the <S%H2983>Jebusite<s%> <S%H5045>southward,<s%> and <S%H3381>went<s%> <S%H3381>down<s%> to En-rogel.

And it <S%H9638>extended<s%> <S%H6828>northward<s%> and <S%H3318>went<s%> to En-shemesh and <S%H3318>went<s%> to <S%H1553>Geliloth,<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> is <S%H5227>opposite<s%> the <S%H4608>ascent<s%> of <S%H131>Adummim,<s%> and it <S%H3381>went<s%> <S%H3381>down<s%> to the <S%H68>stone<s%> of <S%H932>Bohan<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H7205>Reuben.<s%>
And it <S%H5674>continued<s%> to the <S%H3802>side<s%> in <S%H4136>front<s%> of the <S%H6160>Arabah<s%> <S%H6828>northward,<s%> and <S%H3381>went<s%> <S%H3381>down<s%> to the <S%H6160>Arabah.<s%>

And the <S%H1366>border<s%> <S%H5674>continued<s%> to the <S%H3802>side<s%> of Beth-hoglah <S%H6828>northward;<s%> and the <S%H1366>border<s%> <S%H1961>ended<s%> <S%H8444><s%> at the <S%H6828>north<s%> <S%H3956>bay<s%> of the <S%H4417>Salt<s%> <S%H3220>Sea,<s%> at the <S%H5045>south<s%> <S%H7097>end<s%> of the <S%H3383>Jordan.<s%> <S%H2088>This<s%> [was] the <S%H5045>south<s%> <S%H1366>border.<s%>

Moreover, the <S%H3383>Jordan<s%> was its <S%H1379>border<s%> on the <S%H9506>east<s%> <S%H6285>side.<s%> <S%H2088>This<s%> [was] the <S%H5159>inheritance<s%> of the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H1144>Benjamin,<s%> according to their <S%H4940>families<s%> [and] according to its <S%H1367>borders<s%> <S%H5439>all<s%> <S%H5439>around.<s%>

Now the <S%H5892>cities<s%> of the <S%H4294>tribe<s%> of the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H1144>Benjamin<s%> according to their <S%H4940>families<s%> were <S%H3405>Jericho<s%> and Beth-hoglah and Emek-keziz,
and Beth-arabah and <S%H6787>Zemaraim<s%> and <S%H1008>Bethel,<s%>
and <S%H5761>Avvim<s%> and <S%H6511>Parah<s%> and <S%H6084>Ophrah,<s%>
and Chephar-ammoni and <S%H6078>Ophni<s%> and <S%H1387>Geba;<s%> <S%H8147>twelve<s%> <S%H6240><s%> <S%H5892>cities<s%> with their <S%H9161>villages.<s%>
<S%H1391>Gibeon<s%> and <S%H7414>Ramah<s%> and <S%H881>Beeroth,<s%>
and <S%H4708>Mizpeh<s%> and <S%H3716>Chephirah<s%> and <S%H4681>Mozah,<s%>
and <S%H7552>Rekem<s%> and <S%H3416>Irpeel<s%> and <S%H8634>Taralah,<s%>

and <S%H6762>Zelah,<s%> <S%H507>Haeleph<s%> and the <S%H2983>Jebusite<s%> (that is, <S%H3389>Jerusalem<s%>), <S%H1390>Gibeah,<s%> <S%H7157>Kiriath;<s%> <S%H702>fourteen<s%> <S%H6240><s%> <S%H5892>cities<s%> with their <S%H9161>villages.<s%> <S%H2088>This<s%> is the <S%H5159>inheritance<s%> of the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H1144>Benjamin<s%> according to their <S%H4940>families.<s%>
